experience.title: Founder
experience.description: We exist to help businesses grow through the use of Digital Marketing channels!We are a full-service, client-focused digital marketing agency that is determined to help your business grow through the use of digital channels. We’re passionate, data-driven, and eager to help your business succeed.We offer the most effective omnichannel marketing services to clients and business Partners worldwide. We focus on results and every client we work with gets a personalized experience and we value our ongoing education and development. Being ahead of the curve in our industry is important to us, so we work to keep ourselves fresh on all of the latest best practices so you don’t have to.Give us the marketing challenge and we’ll use the latest tools and strategies to develop solutions. Our high level of expertise in digital marketing allows us to fulfill our clients’ goals and objectives in growing their businesses.Tay Digital Consultancy offers the most effective multi-channel and multi-platform Internet marketing services that will help your brand, products, and services reach their full marketing reach and potential. These services include:Web DevelopmentFull Internet Marketing ServicesLead Generation ServicesContent Marketing ServicesSearch Engine Marketing via Pay-Per-Click (PPC) AdvertisingSearch Engine Optimization (SEO)Local SEO ServicesFacebook Paid Marketing ManagementSocial Media Marketing and OptimizationLanding Page CreationInfographic Design and CreationGraphic DesignOur Payoff line is Passion, Value, GrowthThis is because we are motivated by PASSION in all we do and this allows us to provide real VALUE to our clients so that they can see tangible GROWTH!We are ready to serve you!

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: We are a group of passionate, experienced writers who are ready to offer their expertise. We provide solutions for all your writing needs.We specialise in documentation design, creation & editing of website content as well as various other professional writing services for all industries.  Our services also cover any technical document including end-user documentation, knowledge base articles, blog posts, company profiles, social media posts eBooks & more.We are flexible so whether you’re a one-man startup, or a large scale corporate, you will greatly benefit from our services!We take pride in creating all your business documentation with a fresh and personal touch. We edit your document right down to the smallest detail.We can also document your product or services in order to entice and instruct your clients as to how to use your products, which in turn will reduce costs and increase sales.If you create documentation, you may need someone to proof your document for consistency, grammar & spelling issues  & we can do that for you.We exist to help your business grow by providing you with world-class content writing solutions.People prefer companies that have personality and a human voice in their writing. Regardless of whether your business is Business to Consumer (B2C) or Business to Business (B2B), developing and maintaining a consistent brand voice across all facets of your digital marketing strategy is essential to building long-lasting relationships that will maximize customer lifetime value.That is exactly what we will do for you. We provide customized and targeted solutions that will ensure you stand head and shoulders above your competition.With us, your content will WALK, TALK and SELL for you 24/7You can handle other aspects of your business with the full knowledge and confidence that your content writing needs are expertly taken care of.
